00011 int so3_sampling_nalpha(const so3_parameters_t *);

00016 //============================================================================
00017 // Sampling weights
00018 //============================================================================
00019 
00030 complex double so3_sampling_weight(
00031     const so3_parameters_t *parameters, 
00032     int p)
00033 {
00034     switch (parameters->sampling_scheme)
00035     {
00036     case SO3_SAMPLING_MW:
00037     case SO3_SAMPLING_MW_SS:
00038         if (p == 1)
00039             return -I * SSHT_PION2;
00040         else if (p == -1)
00041             return I * SSHT_PION2;
00042         else if (p % 2 == 0)
00043             return 2.0 / (1.0 - p*p);
00044         else
00045             return 0.0;
00046     default:
00047         SO3_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid sampling scheme.");
00048     }
00049 }

00051 //============================================================================
00052 // Sampling relations for all supported sampling schemes
00053 //============================================================================
00054 
00078 int so3_sampling_f_size(const so3_parameters_t *parameters)
00079 {
00080     int L, N;
00081     L = parameters->L;
00082     N = parameters->N;
00083 
00084     return so3_sampling_nalpha(parameters) *
00085            so3_sampling_nbeta(parameters) *
00086            so3_sampling_ngamma(parameters);
00087 }
00088 
00110 int so3_sampling_n(const so3_parameters_t *parameters)
00111 {
00112     int L, N;
00113     L = parameters->L;
00114     N = parameters->N;
00115 
00116     // Are these actually correct?
00117     switch (parameters->sampling_scheme)
00118     {
00119     case SO3_SAMPLING_MW:
00120         return ((2*L-1)*(L-1) + 1)*so3_sampling_ngamma(parameters);
00121     case SO3_SAMPLING_MW_SS:
00122         return ((2*L)*(L-1) + 2)*so3_sampling_ngamma(parameters);
00123     default:
00124         SO3_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid sampling scheme.");
00125     }
00126 }
00127 
00128 
00140 int so3_sampling_nalpha(const so3_parameters_t *parameters)
00141 {
00142     int L;
00143     L = parameters->L;
00144 
00145     switch (parameters->sampling_scheme)
00146     {
00147     case SO3_SAMPLING_MW:
00148         return 2*L - 1;
00149     case SO3_SAMPLING_MW_SS:
00150         return 2*L;
00151     default:
00152         SO3_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid sampling scheme.");
00153     }
00154 }
00155 
00156 
00171 int so3_sampling_nbeta(const so3_parameters_t *parameters)
00172 {
00173     switch (parameters->sampling_scheme)
00174     {
00175     case SO3_SAMPLING_MW:
00176         return parameters->L;
00177     case SO3_SAMPLING_MW_SS:
00178         return parameters->L + 1;
00179     default:
00180         SO3_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid sampling scheme.");
00181     }
00182 }
00183 
00195 int so3_sampling_ngamma(const so3_parameters_t *parameters)
00196 {
00197     int N;
00198     N = parameters->N;
00199 
00200     if (parameters->steerable)
00201         return N;
00202     else
00203         return 2*N-1;
00204 }
00205 
00206 
00222 double so3_sampling_a2alpha(int a, const so3_parameters_t *parameters)
00223 {
00224     int L;
00225     L = parameters->L;
00226 
00227     switch (parameters->sampling_scheme)
00228     {
00229     case SO3_SAMPLING_MW:
00230         return 2.0 * a * SO3_PI / (2.0*L - 1.0);
00231     case SO3_SAMPLING_MW_SS:
00232         return 2.0 * a * SO3_PI / (2.0*L);
00233     default:
00234         SO3_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid sampling scheme.");
00235     }
00236 }
00237 
00238 
00254 double so3_sampling_b2beta(int b, const so3_parameters_t *parameters)
00255 {
00256     int L;
00257     L = parameters->L;
00258 
00259     switch (parameters->sampling_scheme)
00260     {
00261     case SO3_SAMPLING_MW:
00262         return (2.0*b + 1.0) * SO3_PI / (2.0*L - 1.0);
00263     case SO3_SAMPLING_MW_SS:
00264         return 2.0 * b * SO3_PI / (2.0*L);
00265     default:
00266         SO3_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid sampling scheme.");
00267     }
00268 }
00269 
00270 
00286 double so3_sampling_g2gamma(int g, const so3_parameters_t *parameters)
00287 {
00288     int N;
00289     N = parameters->N;
00290 
00291     if (parameters->steerable)
00292         return g * SO3_PI / N;
00293     else
00294         return 2.0 * g * SO3_PI / (2.0*N - 1.0);
00295 }

00297 //============================================================================
00298 // Harmonic index relations
00299 //============================================================================
00300 
00314 int so3_sampling_flmn_size(
00315     const so3_parameters_t *parameters
00316 ) {
00317     int L, N;
00318     L = parameters->L;
00319     N = parameters->N;
00320     switch (parameters->storage)
00321     {
00322     case SO3_STORAGE_PADDED:
00323         if (parameters->reality)
00324             return N*L*L;
00325         else
00326             return (2*N-1)*L*L;
00327     case SO3_STORAGE_COMPACT:
00328         // Both of these are based on the fact that the sum
00329         // over n*n from 1 to N-1 is (N-1)*N*(2*N-1)/6.
00330         if (parameters->reality)
00331             return N*(6*L*L-(N-1)*(2*N-1))/6;
00332         else
00333             return (2*N-1)*(3*L*L-N*(N-1))/3;
00334     default:
00335         SO3_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid storage method.");
00336     }
00337 }
00338 
00367 void so3_sampling_elmn2ind(int *ind, int el, int m, int n, const so3_parameters_t *parameters)
00368 {
00369     int L, N, offset, absn;
00370     L = parameters->L;
00371     N = parameters->N;
00372 
00373     // Most of the formulae here are based on the fact that the sum
00374     // over n*n from 1 to N-1 is (N-1)*N*(2*N-1)/6.
00375     switch (parameters->storage)
00376     {
00377     case SO3_STORAGE_PADDED:
00378         switch (parameters->n_order)
00379         {
00380         case SO3_N_ORDER_ZERO_FIRST:
00381             offset = ((n < 0) ? -2*n - 1 : 2*n) * L*L;
00382             *ind = offset + el*el + el + m;
00383             return;
00384         case SO3_N_ORDER_NEGATIVE_FIRST:
00385             offset = (N-1 + n) * L*L;
00386             *ind = offset + el*el + el + m;
00387             return;
00388         default:
00389             SO3_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid n-order.");
00390         }
00391     case SO3_STORAGE_COMPACT:
00392         switch (parameters->n_order)
00393         {
00394         case SO3_N_ORDER_ZERO_FIRST:
00395             absn = abs(n);
00396             if (absn > el)
00397                 SO3_ERROR_GENERIC("Tried to access component with n > l in compact storage.");
00398             // Initialize offset to the total storage that would be needed if N == n
00399             offset = (2*absn-1)*(3*L*L - absn*(absn-1))/3;
00400             // Advance positive n by another lm-chunk
00401             if (n >= 0)
00402                 offset += L*L - n*n;
00403             *ind = offset + el*el - n*n + el + m;
00404             return;
00405         case SO3_N_ORDER_NEGATIVE_FIRST:
00406             absn = abs(n);
00407             if (absn > el)
00408                 SO3_ERROR_GENERIC("Tried to access component with n > l in compact storage.");
00409             // Initialize offset as for padded storage, minus the correction necessary for n = 0
00410             offset = (N-1 + n) * L*L - (2*N - 1)*(N-1)*N/6;
00411             // Now correct the offset for other n due to missing padding
00412             if (n <= 0)
00413                 offset += absn*(2*absn+1)*(absn+1)/6;
00414             else
00415                 offset -= absn*(2*absn-1)*(absn-1)/6;
00416             *ind = offset + el*el - n*n + el + m;
00417             return;
00418         default:
00419             SO3_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid n-order.");
00420         }
00421     default:
00422         SO3_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid storage method.");
00423     }
00424 }
00425 
00453 void so3_sampling_ind2elmn(int *el, int *m, int *n, int ind, const so3_parameters_t *parameters)
00454 {
00455     int L, N, offset;
00456     L = parameters->L;
00457     N = parameters->N;
00458 
00459     switch (parameters->storage)
00460     {
00461     case SO3_STORAGE_PADDED:
00462         switch (parameters->n_order)
00463         {
00464         case SO3_N_ORDER_ZERO_FIRST:
00465             *n = ind/(L*L);
00466 
00467             if(*n % 2)
00468                 *n = -(*n+1)/2;
00469             else
00470                 *n /= 2;
00471 
00472             ind %= L*L;
00473 
00474             *el = sqrt(ind);
00475             *m = ind - (*el)*(*el) - *el;
00476             return;
00477         case SO3_N_ORDER_NEGATIVE_FIRST:
00478             *n = ind/(L*L) - (N-1);
00479 
00480             ind %= L*L;
00481 
00482             *el = sqrt(ind);
00483             *m = ind - (*el)*(*el) - *el;
00484             return;
00485         default:
00486             SO3_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid n-order.");
00487         }
00488     case SO3_STORAGE_COMPACT:
00489         switch (parameters->n_order)
00490         {
00491         case SO3_N_ORDER_ZERO_FIRST:
00492             offset = 0;
00493             *n = 0;
00494             // TODO: Can this loop be replaced by an analytical function
00495             // (or two - one for positive and one for negative *n)
00496             while(ind + offset >= L*L)
00497             {
00498                 ind -= L*L - offset;
00499 
00500                 if (*n >= 0)
00501                 {
00502                     *n = -(*n+1);
00503                     offset = (*n)*(*n);
00504                 }
00505                 else
00506                 {
00507                     *n = -(*n);
00508                 }
00509             }
00510 
00511             ind += offset;
00512 
00513             *el = sqrt(ind);
00514             *m = ind - (*el)*(*el) - *el;
00515             return;
00516         case SO3_N_ORDER_NEGATIVE_FIRST:
00517             *n = -N+1;
00518             offset = (*n)*(*n);
00519             // TODO: Can this loop be replaced by an analytical function
00520             // (or two - one for positive and one for negative *n)
00521             while(ind + offset >= L*L)
00522             {
00523                 ind -= L*L - offset;
00524 
00525                 (*n)++;
00526                 offset = (*n)*(*n);
00527             }
00528 
00529             ind += offset;
00530 
00531             *el = sqrt(ind);
00532             *m = ind - (*el)*(*el) - *el;
00533             return;
00534         default:
00535             SO3_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid n-order.");
00536         }
00537     default:
00538         SO3_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid storage method.");
00539     }
00540 }
00541 
00569 void so3_sampling_elmn2ind_real(int *ind, int el, int m, int n, const so3_parameters_t *parameters)
00570 {
00571     int base_ind;
00572     so3_parameters_t temp_params;
00573 
00574     // Need to make a copy, because subroutines always use
00575     // NEGATIVE_FIRST storage order.
00576     temp_params = *parameters;
00577     temp_params.n_order = SO3_N_ORDER_NEGATIVE_FIRST;
00578 
00579     // TODO: Could be optimized by computing the indices directly.
00580     switch(parameters->storage)
00581     {
00582     case SO3_STORAGE_PADDED:
00583         so3_sampling_elmn2ind(&base_ind, 0, 0, 0, &temp_params);
00584         so3_sampling_elmn2ind(ind, el, m, n, &temp_params);
00585         (*ind) -= base_ind;
00586         return;
00587     case SO3_STORAGE_COMPACT:
00588         so3_sampling_elmn2ind(&base_ind, 0, 0, 0, &temp_params);
00589         so3_sampling_elmn2ind(ind, el, m, n, &temp_params);
00590         (*ind) -= base_ind;
00591         return;
00592     default:
00593         SO3_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid storage method.");
00594     }
00595 }
00596 
00624 void so3_sampling_ind2elmn_real(int *el, int *m, int *n, int ind, const so3_parameters_t *parameters)
00625 {
00626     int base_ind;
00627     so3_parameters_t temp_params;
00628 
00629     // Need to make a copy, because subroutines always use
00630     // NEG_FIRST storage.
00631     temp_params = *parameters;
00632     temp_params.n_order = SO3_N_ORDER_NEGATIVE_FIRST;
00633 
00634     // TODO: Could be optimized by computing the indices directly.
00635     switch(parameters->storage)
00636     {
00637     case SO3_STORAGE_PADDED:
00638         so3_sampling_elmn2ind(&base_ind, 0, 0, 0, &temp_params);
00639         so3_sampling_ind2elmn(el, m, n, base_ind + ind, &temp_params);
00640         return;
00641     case SO3_STORAGE_COMPACT:
00642         so3_sampling_elmn2ind(&base_ind, 0, 0, 0, &temp_params);
00643         so3_sampling_ind2elmn(el, m, n, base_ind + ind, &temp_params);
00644         return;
00645     default:
00646         SO3_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid storage method.");
00647     }
00648 }
